properties.name: conductor.cassandra.hostAddress
properties.description: The host address for the cassandra database instance.

properties.name: conductor.cassandra.port
properties.description: The port to be used to connect to the cassandra database instance.

properties.name: conductor.cassandra.cluster
properties.description: The name of the cassandra cluster.

properties.name: conductor.cassandra.keyspace
properties.description: The keyspace to be used in the cassandra database.

properties.name: conductor.cassandra.shardSize
properties.description: The number of tasks to be stored in a single partition.

properties.name: conductor.cassandra.replicationStrategy
properties.description: The replication strategy with which to configure the persistence layer.

properties.name: conductor.cassandra.replicationFactorKey
properties.description: The key to be used while configuring the replication factor.

properties.name: conductor.cassandra.replicationFactorValue
properties.description: The replication factor value with which the keyspace is configured.

properties.name: conductor.cassandra.readConsistencyLevel
properties.description: The consistency level to be used for read operations.

properties.name: conductor.cassandra.writeConsistencyLevel
properties.description: The consistency level to be used for write operations.

properties.name: conductor.cassandra.taskDefCacheRefreshTimeSecs
properties.description: The time in seconds to be used after which the task definitions cache will be refreshed.

properties.name: conductor.cassandra.eventHandlerCacheRefreshTimeSecs
properties.description: The time in seconds to be used after which the event handler cache will be refreshed.

properties.name: conductor.cassandra.eventExecutionPersistenceTTLSecs
properties.description: The time to live in seconds for which the event execution will be persisted.
